headline: Constellation Brands price target lowered to $289 from $293 at RBC Capital
summary: RBC Capital lowered the firm’s price target on Constellation Brands (STZ) to $289 from $293 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares. The stock has been virtually flat over the past five years despite delivering on most of its commitments with shareholder friendly capital allocation, 7%-9% beer top line growth and industry-leading margins, and significantly improved the shareholder structure, the analyst tells investors in a research note. headline: Constellation Brands Stock: Buy, Sell, or Hold?
summary: Constellation Brands (NYSE: STZ) shareholders are grappling with the sobering reality of a bitter stock price performance over the past year.  Let's discuss what to do with Constellation Brands stock now.  Constellation Brands has grown into a dominant force in the beer market, holding exclusive rights to market and sell the flagship Corona and Modelo brands in the United States.
